thread.title: Gossip Cathriona White will be laid to rest in Cappawhite tomorrow. Jim Carrey reportedly attending
thread.title_full: Gossip | Cathriona White will be laid to rest in Cappawhite tomorrow. Jim Carrey reportedly attending - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip Cathriona White will be laid to rest in Cappawhite tomorrow. Jim Carrey reportedly attending
text:
According to a notice posted outside Cathriona White's uncle's funeral home, the 30-year-old will be laid to rest in her Tipperary home of Cappawhite tomorrow, Saturday 10th. Outlets report that she will be "buried next to the body of her father, Pat, at a local cemetery following a wake on Friday evening."
Us Weekly , who claim that Jim Carrey will attend tomorrow's funeral, state that "White and the comedian, 53, dated on-and-off after first stepping out together in 2012, but seemed to have rekindled their romance in May after they were spotted holding hands in New York City."
Jim Carrey’s late girlfriend, Cathriona White, will be laid to rest in Ireland this Saturday: http://t.co/fV7Ru6em14
— Us Weekly (@usweekly) October 8, 2015 As for the incessant reports of White's Vegas wedding: “As far as Jim was concerned, Cathriona was separated. She was going to start divorce proceedings in December. There is no way that Jim Carrey would have taken her out to public places if he thought she was married." Not that it's anyone's business anyway.
RIP.
